titleStmt.title: A prayer to God, which the Christian soul may make every day, thereby to declare the sentiments which she desires to have at the point of death wherein are discover'd the acts of all the highest virtues, and especially the divine virtue of contrition, and a perfect love of God.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sam. Keble, at the Turks-head in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
